title.narrative: Xinjiang Urban Transport and Environmental Improvement Project (formerly Xinjiang Urban Transport Infrastructure Development)

description.narrative: The project will invest in urban infrastructure as well as efforts to strengthen urban governance, diversify inestment funding options, and promote the financial sustainability of local governments with the aim of developing productive, environmentally-sustainable and well-managed cities in Xinjiang.
